DOC.detailed_description: DESINGS : We perform randomise , comparative open clinical assay carry 316 HIV-infected patient . The patient randomly assign one three regimen , 108 isoniazid six month ( 6H ) , 103 rifampin isoniazid three month ( 3RH ) , 105 pyrazinamide rifampin two month ( 2RZ ) . RESULTS : The TB rate ( case per 100 persons/year ) three treatment group 3.4 6H , 4.5 3RH 1.9 2RZ . The relative risk TB 6H compare 2RZ 1.76 , 3RH , 2.34 . Twenty-seven percent patient voluntarily abandon chemoprophylaxis 9.7 % withdrawn due adverse side-effects . Seven patient withdraw due hepatotoxicity ( 5 6H , 2 3RH 0 2RZ ) . No appreciable difference find among three regimen . CONCLUSION : In study 2RZ regimen safe 6H 3RH regimen . We observe high incidence hepatotoxicity patient receive 2RZ .
